body_html: @plexus @anikalindtner I think that calls for a separate Company resource. A company could be created the first time someone assigns themself to it and then subsequent coaches/volunteers can select from a list of already existing companies. That way we could decouply the company info from a given user's profile and list it separately. Wdyt?
